entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023
